job_description:
• Design fluid, electrical, or mechanical systems as needed to simulate realistic robot loading scenarios.
• Experience with ROS/ROS2, CAN, SPI, I2C, UART, or other embedded communication protocolsFamiliarity with test equipment such as oscilloscopes, DMMs, signal generators, and power analyzersStrong debugging skills across hardware/software boundariesExperience with HIL frameworks, SIL testing, and real-time system validationExperience designing mechanical or electromechanical test fixturesHands-on experience with FEA, GD&T, and CAD tools (NX, SolidWorks, or similar)Knowledge of battery systems, thermal validation, or EMI/EMC testingExposure to CI/CD systems and version control (e.
• , Git, Jenkins)Background in fast-paced prototyping or manufacturing environmentsExperience with manufacturing end-of-line test systems Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Robotics, Electrical Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Computer Engineering, Mechatronics, or a related field2+ years of experience in one or more of the following:Electromechanical test systemsEmbedded systems/software integrationRobotics validation or manufacturing testingProficiency in Python and C++ for automation and integration tasksExperience working with Linux-based systems and command-line tools Identify and root-cause failures using test data, logs, instrumentation, and schematics.
• Design fluid, electrical, or mechanical systems as needed to simulate realistic robot loading scenarios.
• Prior work with humanoid or legged robotic systemsExperience with perception, sensor fusion, or whole-body control algorithmsBackground in safety-critical systems or regulatory compliance testing Write detailed test plans, checklists, procedures, and pass/fail criteria.
• Full-Stack Testing and ValidationDesign and execute functional, environmental, and performance tests for critical subsystems—locomotion, perception, manipulation, power, thermal, and more.
• Lead test planning, procedure creation, execution, and reporting for both subsystem-level and system-level robotic assemblies.
• Automation & Test InfrastructureDevelop and maintain automated test frameworks, including software-in-the-loop (SIL), hardware-in-the-loop (HIL), and end-of-line (EOL) tests.
